question: Match the following:
columnA: World Health Organisation (WHO) definition of reproductive health
Physically and functionally normal reproductive organs
Normal emotional and behavioural interactions among people in all sex-related aspects
columnB: A society might be called reproductively healthy
Healthy reproductive organs with normal functions
A total well-being in all aspects of reproduction, i.e., physical, emotional, behavioural and social
Includes emotional and social aspects of reproduction
